# Install

If you have previously installed wool, you can upgrade it with:

wool install wool/cli

If you do not have wool installed already, pick an installer from below for your platform:

# 0.1.0 – Latest

MacOS (.dmg)

Windows (.exe)

Linux (.?)

# Older

# 0.0.0

MacOS (.dmg)

Windows (.exe)

Linux (.?)
